message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.HC 

The paper proposes a novel learning framework for recommendation systems, which involves a recommender and a virtual user. The recommender is formulated as a collaborative-filtering method, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The virtual user estimates rewards and generates the influence of the rewards on observed user behavior, which can be seen as a form of reinforcement learning, falling under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the potential applications of the proposed framework in human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and social networks (cs.SI). Therefore, the most likely categories are cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, and cs.HC.
